deck: Thief from Zamora.
description:
Shevatus (in Howard's story named Shevatas) was a master-thief from Zamora who sought to steal treasure of Thugra Kotan's Ivory Dome in Kuthchemes. He successfully negotiated several obstacles, but met his end in the central treasure chamber.

"...wiry and lithe, as became a master-thief of Zamora. His small round head was shaven, his only garment a loin-cloth of scarlet silk. Like all his race, he was very dark, his narrow vulture-like face set off by his keen black eyes. His long, slender and tapering fingers were quick and nervous as the wings of a moth. From a gold-scaled girdle hung a short, narrow, jewel-hilted sword in a sheath of ornamented leather. Shevatas handled the weapon with apparently exaggerated care..."

Shevatas description from "Black Colossus" by Robert E.Howard
name: Shevatus

deck: The Karaqan is one of the legendary Atlantean avatar beasts that served as primal protectors of Atlantis.
description:
Creation

Karaqan was created by Aquaman writer Jeff Parker and artist Paul Pelletier. He made his debut in Aquaman #26

Current Events

The Karaqan awakes when the personnel of Triton Base discover it in the Northern Atlantic and try to harvest it, thinking the Karaqan is dead and fossilized.

It proceeds to wreak havoc in the port of Reykjavik in Iceland and the military is proven ineffective against it. The creature tears apart one ocean liner cruise ship and incinerates multiple fighter jets before Aquaman arrives on the scene. The Atlantean Council members Neol and Koah recognize the beast as one of the legendary protectors from the the past of Atlantis. Aquaman notes that Karaqan is possibly bigger than Topo.

After a fierce battle Aquaman kills the creature with his Trident , which then self immolates, destroying it's remains.

During the battle Aquaman makes telepathic contact with the creature and discovers it's history. The creature is a legendary avatar beast and champion of Atlantis, sworn to obey the royal family. Aquaman witnessed how the creature destroyed an invading force of Othermen and how it was celebrated and loved by the people of Atlantis. The Karaqan possesses intelligence as it can follow orders and appreciate gratitude.

Later Dr. Orson from the Triton Base uses a Karaqan sample to create the new Creature King.

Powers & Abilities

Karaqan is a colossal crustacean megaform cryptozoid and legendary protector of Atlantis.

Superhuman Strength

Karaqan is immense in size and strong enough to pick up and tear apart an entire ocean liner cruise ship or knock out Aquaman temporarilly by stomping on him.

Invulnerability

Karaqan is crustacean looking and is protected by an extremely tough carapace that makes it invulnerable to fighter jet missiles and Aquaman's strongest punches.

Underwater Adaptation

The Karaqan can function normally underwater and is unaffected by the temperatures and pressures of the deep.

Amphibian

It can survive both on land and underwater.

Longevity

The Karaqan can live for an extended period of time. According to Triton Base it's older than 2700 years.

Consumption

The Karaqan uses it's massive mouth to attack and eat it's enemies. It can eat through a ship or a submarine and consume entire squads of opponents.

Flame Breath

The Karaqan can project blast of green flame from it's mouth, strong enough to incinerate multiple fighter jets.

issue_credits.name: Maelstrom VI: The Edge of the World

name: Karaqan

deck: A crook who tries to kill Nyoka, but later saves her life
description: After Craggly almost kills Nyoka by knocking her unconscious and leaving meat by her to attract wild animals, he comes back to save her life. However, he only does so because he is stranded on an island with her and the island is soon to be the target of an atomic bomb test. He figures that Nyoka is his only hope for getting off the island and avoiding the deadly bomb. She does saves his life, but at the end of the story she takes him back to the mainland as her prisoner. He stands trial and is ordered to turn over his entire circus to Lorimer, as partial payment for the damage he caused to the Lorimer Circus.
name: Craggly

deck: Werewolf and psychopath.
name: Anton Chavoy

deck: Kavari warrior.
description:
Origin

As a member of the Kavari tribe, Thorne is raised with the notion that the tribe is his family and that honor is very important. One day out hunting with his son, they came upon a Skarab warrior. Telling his son to run back to the village to warn their chief, he did not stay for long. He also went back to the village, gather his son and wife and hid in the mountains. Ashamed for his actions, he joined Glinda's quest to retrieve the Veridian Scepter, hoping it would regain his honor.

Creation

Like most characters of the Grimm Fairy Tales lore, Thorne has his inspiration in fairy tales or literature. Thorne is inspired on the Cowardly Lion from L. Frank Baum's children's book The Wonderful Wizard of Oz (1900).

Major Story Arcs

Oz: Age of Darkness

Seventyfive years have passed. Dorothy Gale is now queen of Oz, ruling with Thorne, Scarecrow and Toto by her side. The Dark Queen recovers the Warlord of Oz and sets him loose on Oz. He manages to kill Thorne, Scarecrow and Toto before beheading Dorothy Gale. He then sits on the throne of Oz himself.

deck: Fuyumi is the female lead of the anime/manga Blood Lad. She came to the Demon World by accident, and became a ghost after being eaten by a plant. With Staz, she is now trying to find a way to come back to life, so she can come home to the Human World.
description:
When Fuyumi was very little, her mother met her doppelganger from the Demon World. Therefor, the two women was combined into one woman due to magic, and became the woman known as Neyn. After a long debate between the two husbands, who now shared one wife, Fuyumi's father decided that i would be best if Fuyumi was raised in the Human World, and the woman now known as Nyen, who was partly his wife, traveled to the Demon World to live with her other husband; Heads Hydra, and their daughter Bell. Fuyumi doesn't remember any of this since she was too young to understand what was going on at the moment, and her father decided that it was best not to tell her.

Fuyumi grew up to be a very kind, but also pretty shy and sometimes even naive young woman. She had a pretty normal upbringing, living with her father, and attending school. But all this changed when she walk through the magical portal known as "The Black Curtain" witch happened to be in her room, and she found herself in the Demon World. She would have been killed, if not for Staz, who had a huge interest in her, since she was from the Human World, witch he adored. The fact that she was Japanese only made her even more interesting(and attractive) for the nerdy vampire.

But she was soon eaten by a huge carnivorous plant, when Staz left her for taking care of someone who wanted to take over his territory. And since Fuyumi was in the Demon World when she died, she became a demon herself, a ghost to be specific. Staz behavior toward Fuyumi changed drastically, now that she is no longer a creature of flesh and blood, and the physical attraction toward her was gone. But he made a vow to her; to find a way to get her back to life(in order to suck her blood, but he doesn't say that).

After a quick visit to the Human World with Staz, Fuyumi learns that she cant stay too long, since she has a low amount of magic, so she will start to disappear when she runs low. To make sure she wont, Staz feed her some of her magic by letting her drink some of his blood. This would later show to be a mistake.

Before leaving the Human World, Staz makes sure to use his demonic powers to make everyone believe that Fuyumi is still in the Human World, so that no one will notice that she was dead, once she returns home as human.

Coming home, the are met by the witch Bell Hydra who accuse them for stealing her "Black Curtain." Bell kidnaps Fuyumi, an order Staz to get her a certain pair of demon underpants from a demon shop. As Staz gets the underwear, Bell explains Fuyumi that she is looking for the thief who stole her "curtain," so that she can marry him.

After getting the underpants, Bell tells them that the only way to resurrect Fuyumi is by the use of "The Book of Human Resurrection" that is in the possession of Wolf, Staz old friend.

Staz ask Wolf for the book, but even though Wolf is Staz friend, just giving the book away is not a option for a territory boss, so he challenge Staz to a boxing match, with the book as the prize. But if Wolf win, he gets Fuyumi. At the fight, Fuyumi has the function as the ring girl, much to her dismay.

Wolf has the obvious advantage with his werewolf strength, but Staz succeed getting the upper hand by draining Wolf for magic. But the fight almost ends badly, when Wolf starts insulting Staz, witch enrage Staz to the point that he attempts to use his magic to crush Wolf's heart. Staz is luckily stopped by Fuyumi, and the match ends without a winner. But Staz gets the book anyway, since Wolf never had it. Bell just wanted to test Staz, and gives it to him.

Staz travels to Acropolis to find the author to the book, and leaves Fuyumi under Wolf's protection. But it is soon shown that Fuyumi is slowly starting to fade. After Wolf takes her to Franken Stein, a demon doctor, it is revealed that she is no longer capable of absorbing magic from the Demon World's atmosphere now that she has fed on Staz's blood, and without magic, she will seize to exist. The only way to keep her from fading away is by feeding her vampire magic. Franken has some on store, until Staz returns and can feed her himself.

Staz eventually comes home, and can now feed Fuyumi with the kind of blood she needs. She is also introduced to Staz's brother Braz, who takes a sample of her, and promise to start working on resurrecting her. He plans on doing so by making a replica of her body, and attach her soul to it. When Braz leaves, the youngest Blood sibling named Liz is left behind. Fuyumi shows much kindness toward the little girl, and they start bonding, almost like sisters. Liz is the first to notice that Fuyumi has been abducted, since they slept in the same bed.

At the middle of the night, a blond boy named Knell abducts Fuyumi by the use of spatial magic, and brings her to the Hydra family's palace.

at the palace, she is greeted by Lady Nyen, who are very happy to she her daughter after so many years. She is finally told why her mother left her and her father.

While changing clothes, Bell ask Fuyumi how she fells for Staz, and if she is in love with him. She says that she appreciate that he try so hard to resurrect her, and that she cares for him, but If it' love, she do not know, and will probably only find out, once she is back to life.

Then, out of nowhere, Fuyumi is teleported outside the palace. The very confuse(and half-naked) Fuyumi find Staz lying on the grass sleeping. When he wakes up, he starts to act all of a curtain very nice toward her, and even trys to smile, witch just looks creepy. Staz tells Fuyumi that he has done her a great deal more harm than good, and promise her that he will never leave her side, and that she is now in charge. They leave the palace together on their quest for Fuyumi's revival. Their next destination is Braz palace.

Powers & Abilities

Fuyumi died in the Demon World, and sine she was human and not demon, she became a ghost. She has no magical powers besides being a demon, witch makes her immune to certain kinds of magic that only works on humans. But as any other ghost, she can consume magic from other demons, and has the potential to become a very powerful hybrid. And since she has fed on Staz's magic, she is now a hybrid-vampire. Franken believes that Fuyumi will eventually become even more powerful than Staz.

But unlike other demons, she cant bread the atmosphere in the Demon World to consume magic, and therefor MUST feed on other demons.

Fuyumi is also a very good cook.
name: Fuyumi Yanagi

aliases:
Buraddo Chārī Sutazu
ブラッド・チャーリー・スタズ
Cherry-Blood
deck: Staz is the main character of the manga/anime series; Blood Lad. He is a teenage vampire from the Demon World with an obsession for anything human-made, especially if it is Japanese. He has made it his life's goal to get the ghost Fuyumi back to life.
description:
Staz was born into a high-class family of vampires. Early in his childhood, his brother Braz started to experiment on him to make his demonic powers evolve. This soon showed to be a mistake, since Staz young body couldn't handle being a vessel of so much power. After Braz shot Staz in the heart with an enchanted bullet to lower down his powers and save his life, Staz ran away from home and made a new home in the Lower Demon World, where he became a territory boss, due to his powers being superior to the other demons. He found a friend in Wolf(also a demon of noble blood).

Staz used the most of his life to collect human-made things(mostly from Japan) but never traveled to the Human World himself, since he also was pretty busy being a territory boss. But one day, a human girl, named Fuyumi, comes to the Demon World by accident, and Staz falls in love(or at least lust) at first sight. But she is soon eaten by a carnivorous plants, and transformed into a ghost. Realizing that all attraction he had toward Fuyumi is gone with her flesh and blood, he made it his life's goal to resurrect her (so he could suck her blood).

Staz and Fuyumi learns that she came to the Demon World by the use of a magical portal called "The Black Curtain" that happens to be in her room. After using it for a quick visit to the Human World, they were confronted by it's owner; the dimension-traveling witch Bell Hydra. She wants to find the thief, and believes that Staz might be the one, but after testing him, she realize that this is not the case, and tells them about the "Book Of Human Resurrection," and that it is in Wolf's possession.

Staz ask Wolf for the book, but even though Wolf is Staz friend, just giving the book away is not a option for a territory boss, so he challenge Staz to a boxing match, with the book as the prize. But if Wolf win, he gets Fuyumi.

Wolf has the obvious advantage with his werewolf strength, but Staz succeed getting the upper hand by draining Wolf for magic. But the fight almost ends badly, when Wolf starts insulting Staz, witch enrage Staz to the point that he attempts to use his magic to crush Wolf's heart. Staz is luckily stopped by Fuyumi, and the match ends without a winner. But Staz gets the book anyway, since Wolf never had it. Bell just wanted to test Staz, and gives it to him.

But the book is written in code, so the only way to get the secret of resurrection is through the author of the book; Staz's brother Braz. Staz has no choice but to travel to Acropolis, home to the elite demons, and he must do it alone, since he is of noble blood. He ends up being caught by his little sister Liz, who are also the warden of the Demon World. She hates his brother because he ran away(and also due to jealousy, since Braz care more for Staz) and imprisons him in the Demon World prison.

Staz can only leave the prison if he can beat the two prisons guards, Zombie Brothers. Staz challenge them to battle several times, but gets beaten to a pulp. But he regenerate quickly after each fight, challenge them again, and the now board zombies threaten to actually kill him. But when Braz learns that Staz is prison, he comes to offer him a deal: if Staz will take care of a run-amok demon called Akim Papradon, he will resurrect Fuyumi. Braz then removes the enchanted bullet from Staz's heart, and beating the Zombie Brothers is now easy, and he annihilates them.

Staz is now free to go, and leaves Acropolis to fight Akim with his now very powerful magic. He fights Akim, seemingly destroys him(Akim manege to escape by he use of spatial magic), and even have enough energy to fight and defeat Wolf, who he takes it easy on, much to his old friend's irritation.

Staz has fulfilled his part of the bargain, and after taking a sample from Fuyumi, Braz promise to restore her to life. Braz returns to Acropolis, and leaves Liz with Staz.

Staz decides that if Liz has to stay, since she has been forbidden to go home, she might as well have as much fun as possible. He shows Liz around in the his district, let her use his manga and anime collection, and even buys her a stuffed animal.

The next day, Fuyumi is nowhere to be found. A note is left, but it is more likely that she has been kidnapped. Staz begs Liz to go home to Acropolis, since Braz has implanted a tracker on her, and Liz can therefor find Fuyumi by use of it.

Staz hears that a unknown blond boy has been seen recently, so he starts looking for him.

Staz finds the blond boy, but the boy's name is Knell, and is the brother of Bell Hydra. Bell, knowing that her brother is just running a errand for their mother by kidnapping Fuyumi, decides to aid him(it also helps that she is angered by Staz caring more for Fuyumi than her) and challenge Staz to a duel.

The fight doesn't go very well for Staz, since Bell's portals makes it impossible to land a single hit on her, but when she got cocky, Staz manege to grab a hold on her with his magic. She manege to get free, but loses her pants and carrying bag. going through the bag, he realize that Bell doesn't want him to read her notebook(she has written that she loves Staz in it), and Staz threatens to read it, unless she gives up, and take him to Fuyumi.

Bell takes Staz to her family's palace, where he once again meets Fuyumi. To find out what is going on, Staz must pretend to be Bell's new boyfriend, but this doesn't works since Bell's mother Neyn is pen-pal with Braz. It is revealed that Neyn is two women combined, with one of them being Fuyumi's mother.

Staz is soon confronted by Bell's father; Heads Hydra. He starts to fight Staz, since Braz has told the Hydra family that Staz want Fuyumi back to life, so he can suck her blood. Staz admit to Heads that this was his first intention, but it's something more. If it' love, he do not know, and will probably only find out, once Fuyumi is back to life.

Hydra then makes Staz a deal: He will let Staz leave the palace with Fuyumi, IF he eats a "cursed dumpling". By eating it, Staz must now do everything Fuyumi ask of him, and he cannot force her into doing anything against her will. And if Staz wish to drink her blood, he must ask permission first, and accept if Fuyumi's answer is "no." If he breaks this vow, Staz will die (the curse is fake, but Staz buys it). Staz eats it, and falls asleep after eating the dumpling, fully believing that he is now cursed.

When Staz wakes up, he is found by Fuyumi who were teleported to him by Hydra. Staz tells Fuyumi that he has done her a great deal more harm than good, and He will stop being selfish. He promise her that he will never leave her side until she is alive again, and that she is now in charge. They leave the palace together on their quest for Fuyumi's revival. Their next destination is Braz palace.

Now back in the Lower Demon World, they are confronted by a team of assassins called Team Fearless, who are hired by Lady Neyn to kill Staz and bring Fuyumi to her. They almost maneged to kill Staz, but he ends up defeating them after using his materialized magic to tap some of them for blood and magic. He let them live, after they promise to fly him and Fuyumi to Acropolis.

Powers & Abilities

Staz is a vampire, and therefor among the elite of demons. His powers are fully evolved, due to experiments performed on him when he was a child. His powers has been sealed for the most of his life by his brother Braz, but even though he was for a long time weaker than an ordinary vampire, he was still more powerful than lower class demons, and became a territory boss without any problems.

Now that his powers has been unsealed, he is many times more powerful than he was before. His power is calculated to the value of 36400 organ(a normal demon's organ is 3000). He able to make his magic take physical form, often a huge hand with claws. Staz can use this hand to attack and grab an enemy, but he can also use it for transportation by trowing himself with the hand. His materialized magic can also suck out blood and magic from whoever it stabs.

Staz magic is used for long range combat, witch makes his body vulnerable. He compensates for this by having incredible regeneration, that makes him survive even the strongest attacks, as long as he has magic enough.

Being a vampire, Staz has a set of magical fangs, which he can use to suck out blood or magic from whoever he bites. He can still absorb magic, even if the fang is broken of, as long as it's in the flesh of who he wish to drain. His fangs can also be used to alter humans memories and control their actions, but demons are immune to this.

Staz finishing move is called Heart Constriction: ZIP, where he use his magic to grab around his opponents inner organs(mostly the heart) and crush them. After his magic was unsealed, he now crush the entire body.

Weapons and Equipment

When Staz travels to the human world, he carries a spray-bottle with tiny bits of his fang mixed with water. Staz can that way control humans without biting them, but simply spraying them.
name: Staz Charlie Blood

高須 竜児
name: Ryuuji Takasu

aliases:
Buraddo D. Burazzu
ブラッド・D・ブラッズ
Santa Claus
deck: The eldest child of the Blood Family, brother to Staz and Liz. Braz goal is to overthrow the king of the Demon World, who are also the murderer of his father; Wolf Daddy.
description:
When Braz was a child, he watched as Wolf Daddy killed his father, the king of the Demon World, and therefor became the new ruler. Braz made it his life's goal to get revenge on his father's murderer and get a worthy ruler for the throne.

When Wolf Daddy became king, he took over the royal palace, and send the Blood family to live somewhere else. He gave Braz the job of observing the Lower Demon World. With both their parents dead, Braz became responsible for his siblings; Staz and Liz.

When his younger brother Staz was very little, Braz began to experiment on him to make his demonic powers evolve. This soon showed to be a mistake, since Staz's young body couldn't handle being a vessel of so much power. After Braz shot Staz in the heart with a enchanted bullet to lower down his powers and save his life, Staz ran away from home and made a new home in the Lower Demon World. Braz missed his brother so much that he made his sister Liz fell less loved.

Years later, Braz discover that Staz has recently been arrested by Liz, and thrown into "Liz's Toy Box." He goes to the prison, and offer Staz both his freedom, powers and even that he will resurrect Fuyumi for him, if he will fight a monster named Papradon. Staz does not accept the offer to begin with, since he has no wish for power, but Braz force him by giving the Zombie Brothers permission to kill him. Staz must now accept Braz offer, and becomes many times more powerful after getting the bullet out of his heart. Staz annihilates the zombies, and are now free to go.

After Staz has defeated the monstrosity, Braz swears that he will keep his end of the bargain, takes a DNA sample of Fuyumi, and promise to start working on resurrecting her. He plans on doing so by making a replica of her body, and attach her soul to it. But he also plans on taking out the magic from the sample that used to be Staz magic, so he can use it for his own purposes.

When Braz leaves, he tells Liz that she has to stay with Staz for a while to keep an eye on Staz, and directly forbid her from coming home until he tells her to. Once coming home, he writes a email to his pen-pal, Lady Neyn, where it says that Staz is going to drink Fuyumi's blood.

Unfortunately for Braz, Liz disobeys him for the first time, witch results in Braz being arrested by Beros for leaving Acropolis without permission, and must were Beros' cursed collar that will burn him up, if he use magic. Braz takes the arrest with a smile, and even tease Beros, implying that she is a dominatrix.

Brazis taken to king Wolf Daddy, who compliments Braz for getting Papradon, but also that he knows that Papradon was once one of his subordinate. Braz nonchalantly admits that he killed him, and gave him to Franken in order to make him into the monster he is now, and he also declares war against Wolf Daddy, saying that he has found a more suitable king. Wolf Daddy gives Braz three days to find his so-called candidate for the throne, so he can kill both him AND Braz.

Braz then manege to escape by biting himself on the finger, witch activates his regeneration, and therefor also Beros' collar. As Braz is burning, he screams for help, to witch the confused Beros takes the collar of Braz's neck, and Braz then subdue her by putting her to sleep.

Braz is soon chased by Beros' partner; Goyle, who believes that Beros is dead, and therefor wants Braz in custody, but his blood on his hands. Goyle's magic powered by his rage, so Braz manege to make him him weak by telling him that Beros is alive, and whatever blood he saw on her was his. He also threatens to use his "Blood Stalker" ability to kill Beros, if Goyle wont cooperate.

Powers & Abilities

Braz is a vampire, and therefor among the elite of demons. He able to make his magic take physical form, mostly in the shape of swords. He can also use it to create wings, witch allow him flight.

Being a vampire, Braz has a set of magical fangs, witch he can use to suck out blood or magic from whoever he bites. He can still absorb magic, even if the fang is broken of, as long as it's in the flesh of who he wish to drain. His fangs can also be used to alter humans memories and control their actions, but demons are immune to this.

Braz magic is used for long range combat, witch makes his body vulnerable to attacks. He compensates for this by having incredible regeneration, that makes him survive even the strongest attacks, as long as he has magic enough. He even allows Staz to break his writs from time to time, seemingly not being bothered by it.

Braz also has the unique ability called "Blood Stalker," that allows him to manipulate his blood. He can make it take any kind of shape, and move it around at will. He even has control over his blood if it's many miles away from him.

Braz is a skilled marksman, despite the fact that he does not use his gun for actual combat.

Braz is also a brilliant Under World scientist, who has discovered the secret behind human resurrection. It's thanks to his experiments that Staz is as powerful as he is.

Weapons and Equipment

Braz is always carrying a revolver, but it's main use is not as a weapon. It has magical bullets, such as one that restore the magic of whoever he shoots, or bullets that seals one persons magic. He can also use it if he needs to take a DNA sample, or planting a sender on someone.
name: Braz D. Blood

deck: Younger brother of Bell and Fuyumi's.
name: Knell Hydra

aliases:
Buraddo T. Rizu
ブラッド・T・リズ
The Jailer
deck: Younger sister of Braz and Staz Blood. Liz is in charge of keeping order in the Demon World and and sentence whoever she finds guilty to her prison known as "Liz's Toy Box."
description:
Liz was raised by her older brother Braz, but she always felt sat to side, since Braz apparently cared more for their brother Staz, who had ran away from home. No mater what Liz did to please her brother, Braz was often busy looking at photos of Staz, or checking if he was okay in the Lower Under World through his crystal ball.

Being responsible for law and order, the most people was afraid of the little girl, unless they tried to suck up to her, witch made Liz very lonely and emotionally withdrawn girl.

When Staz comes back to the family palace, Liz is there to "greet" him. She use her authority to send her brother to the Demon World jail known as "Liz's Toy Box," saying that being related to her and Braz is a crime in itself for Staz.

Once Staz is in his cell, Liz informs him that he, like all the other prisoners, are free to go whenever he wants. All he have to do is fight and defeat the Zombie Brothers. This is easier said than done, since the zombies are unkillable, and Staz is just not powerful enough.

This doesn't stop him from challenging the brothers over and over again, and Braz ends up hearing that there is problems with one of the prisoners, and finds out that Liz has sent Staz in the prison.

After seeing how happy Braz is to see his little brother, Liz shows her true collars, attempting to attack Staz with her magic, angry over being the least loved one, only to be stopped by Braz. After Braz unseal Staz magic, Staz annihilates the Zombie Brothers, and Liz has no choice but to let her much hated brother go.

Later, Liz travels to the Lower Demon World with Braz to sentence Franken Stein, who created a monster that ran amok, to imprisonment in "Liz's Toy Box." After this, Braz tells Liz that she has to stay with Staz for a while to keep an eye on Staz, and directly forbid her from coming home until he tells her to.

Staz decides that if Liz has to stay, she might as well have as much fun as possible. He shows Liz around in the his district, let her use his manga and anime collection, and even buys her a stuffed animal witch she holds very dear.

Liz also meets Fuyumi, who shows much kindness toward Liz, something no one but Braz has done. They start bonding, almost like sisters, and Liz even opens up to Fuyumi, admitting that she has felt lonely for as long as she can remember, to witch Fuyumi says that she will stay by her side. Liz is the first to notice that Fuyumi has been abducted, since they slept in the same bed.

Liz tells Staz that Braz has implanted a tracker on Fuyumi, and Liz can therefor find her by use of it. But to locate her, Liz has to go home to Acropolis, despite Braz's order. Staz begs Liz to do it, and offer to tell Bras that he forced her into it, and he even tell Liz that he will give her his collection of manga, anime and everything else he has from the Human World, if only she will help her this once. Liz says that she will do it, but that the stuffed animal he gave her is enough for her. She also reminds Staz that she is not only doing it for him, but also for Fuyumi, and she will never forgive him if he fails to save her. Liz then goes home, disobeying Braz for the first time in her life.

Powers & Abilities

Even though Liz is still a child, she is a vampire, and therefor among the elite of demons. She can make her magic take physical form, mostly as axes, witch she use to slice her opponents. She can also use it to create wings, witch allow her flight.

Liz magic is used for long range combat, witch makes her body vulnerable. She compensates for this by having incredible regeneration, that makes her survive even the strongest attacks, as long as she has magic enough.

Being a vampire, Liz has a set of magical fangs, witch she can use to suck out blood or magic from whoever she bites. She can still absorb magic, even if the fang is broken of, as long as it's in the flesh of who she wish to drain. Her fangs can also be used to alter humans memories and control their actions, but not demons.

Liz is also a skilled ax-fighter, and surprisingly graceful with her heavy weapon.

Weapons and Equipment

Being the law of the Demon World, Liz is armed with a huge ax, that allows her to use the magic known as "Judgment Impact." it summons a gigantic arm from heaven, that lands it's fist with the word "Guilty" on her opponents, and sends them to her jail for imprisonment. She can also use it on herself as a mean to escape, if she needs to retreat from battle quickly. It also works as a formidable weapon, witch she use surprisingly well and with ease.

Liz is usually seen wearing a mask. Not so much for protection of her head, but to hide her face, and therefor all her feelings, and also the fact that she is just a little girl.
name: Liz T. Blood

aliases:
Haidora Beru
ハイドラベル
deck: Dimension-traveling witch, and and freelance treasurer-hunter for hire. She is on a hunt for the thief who stole her "Black Curtain." She is in love with Staz Blood.
description:
When Bell was a little girl, she traveled to the Human World. On the trip, her mother met her doppelganger, and the two women was combined due to magic, and became the woman known as Lady Neyn. During a long argument between Bell's parents and the husband to the husband to the woman that was part of Neyn, Bell was playing with her new "sister" Fuyumi, and created a "black curtain" to travel to the Demon World. When the adults saw this, and stopped the two girls from going to the Demon World alone, it was decided that raising a human child(Fuyumi) was way to risky, so Fuyumi's father decided to let Neyn travel home with Bell and Heads(Bell's father).

Years later, Bell had become a highly skilled sorceress, with the power to create dimensional portals(a power inherited from her father) witch she use to her job as a treasure hunter. She has clients from both the Human and Demon World, since she can travel between the two world by the use of a "black curtain" witch she can summon. One day, she learns that someone has stolen her magic, and start looking for the thief, finding Staz and Fuyumi using her stolen magic. Believing Staz might be the thief, she makes him go through tests, such as getting her a pair of ogre underpants, and lie about the whereabouts of the "book of human resurrection" in order to see Staz fight Wolf. After being threatened by Wolf angry over almost getting killed in a fight she arranged, she agrees to help Staz getting to his brother Braz.

After a talk and a very fast fight(witch Bell won) Bell realize that Staz couldn't possibly be the one who stole her "black curtain," since his vampire powers are sealed away due to a bullet in his heart. Interested in what sort of power Staz has hidden inside of him, she makes him promise that he will ask his brother to get the bullet out. Bell also realize that she is in love with Staz.

Powers & Abilities

Bell's magic allow her to travel through space in order to reach a different destination. It's not unlimited, since it requires a frame to jump through. She can also use a frame or space to see through it, like a window, allowing her to spy on someone. She can also use her magic to transport others, or form portals that can redirect physical and magical attacks.

Bell is also able to materialize her magic into a physical form(a box witch she can split up in 6 squares). She can use this to attack or create frames used to portals.

Bell is also a very good marksman.

Weapons and Equipment

Bell often travels with handguns, witch she use very well. She can combine them with a portals, and that way create a very deadly long-distant fighting style.

Bell is usually seen with a abnormally large backpack, holding all of her equipment and treasure.
name: Bell Hydra
